text: Markus Svendsen (born 28 February 1941 in Havøysund) is a Norwegian skier. He was born in Havøysund and represented the club IL i BUL, Oslo. He competed in Nordic combined at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, where he placed 27th. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People from Måsøy Category:Norwegian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Norway Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics
title: Markus Svendsen
